charge. It is possible that certain athletes make systematic studies of deodor-
ants before giving one deodorant their endorsement. But it is not likely. 
Most people realize that athletes, movie stars, and the like are featured in
advertisements primarily to attract attention and not because they are ex-
perts concerning the products they are endorsing. It is more surprising how
often the wrong authorities are brought in to judge serious matters. To cite
one example, U
